name: @briebug/jest-schematic
description: Add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox/ng-cli && git clean -f -d sandbox/ng-cli
scripts.test: yarn clean:launch && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox/ng-cli && yarn lint && yarn test --no-cache && yarn e2e && yarn build
scripts.link:sandbox: yarn link && cd sandbox/ng-cli && yarn link @briebug/jest-schematic
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"

author: Briebug
